section.title: evt_weight Struct Reference
Detailed Description
section.para: Weight of a versioned extent, different tree policy could use different algorithm to calculate the weight. The generic code should honor "major" more than "minor".
NB: structure members can be negative while computing "difference" between weights.
Definition at line 186 of file evtree.h.
